alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 7:16PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Cherry, southwestern Brown, northwestern Blaine and northern Thomas Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 715 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Brownlee to 6 miles southwest of Thedford. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Thedford, Halsey, Elsmere, Purdum, Brownlee, Norway, Koshopah, Moon Lake, Natwick, Willow Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Long Lake State Wildlife Management Area and Highway 83 crossing the North Loup River. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 200 and 230. Highway 83 between mile markers 139 and 174. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
